: : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :

Rodimus smiled.

Rodimus Prime: Well when we are finished here i suggest you use the base's history banks. It might do you good to read up on our race.

Rodimus's attention returns to the artifact.

Rodimus Prime: Kup, you think it's safe to take back with us?

Kup: I'm not getting any reading that would say it's harmfull, so I think we can take it. I'll transport it in my bed.

Kup transformes to his truck mode.

Rodimus lifts the artifact from the ground and puts it in Kup's bed. He then transformes himself.

Rodimus Prime: Alright lets head home.

They both pull out, heading for Maximal base. 
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 11:40 PM
  Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron


  Nightlight::

  "I don't know anything about..."replied Nightlight"I know that I'm a 
  maximal 'cause when I left my pod I was inside the base and I notice 
  that asignal in my pod was the same as one that Blackfang had... He 
  said that he had found my pod covered by plants and... over some 
  things that he told me about us I don't know anything else...."



  --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  > : : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :
  > 
  > Kup:  Well now your getting ahead of my time. As far as I know the 
  Maximals won the first Beast Wars, and just returned to Cybertron.
  > 
  > Rodimus Prime: You dont know about the Maximal Council of Elders? 
  Your a Maximal, you should know about our government.
  >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   From: airly2000 
  >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:30 AM
  >   Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  > 
  > 
  >   Nightlight::
  > 
  >   "The MAximal Council of Elders??"she said as if that didn't meant 
  any 
  >   for her, after that she said "And Primal?? What happen with the 
  war 
  >   that started here? "
  > 
  > 
  >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  >   > : : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :
  >   > 
  >   > Kup: I'm not really sure...
  >   > 
  >   > Rodimus Prime: I do. He simply retired when we switched from 
  having 
  >   one supreme Commander to the Maximal Council of Elders.
  >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   >   From: airly2000 
  >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   >   Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:11 AM
  >   >   Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  >   > 
  >   > 
  >   >   Nightlight::
  >   > 
  >   >   "What happen with Optimus??"asked Nightlight"is he still 
  alive?"
  >   > 
  >   > 
  >   > 
  >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  >   >   > : : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > Kup: Well we are getting a little off track...
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > Rodimus Prime: Go ahead and tell her the stories Kup. Our 
  >   history 
  >   >   doesn't bother me, just Galvatron.
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > Kup: Very well. You see Nightlight Optimus had once been 
  >   brought 
  >   >   back but with little control of himself. He was a zombie. It 
  was 
  >   all 
  >   >   a Quintesson trap. He was to lead us Autobots to are 
  destruction. 
  >   >   Prime fought it though and saved us, however he was on a ship 
  >   that 
  >   >   was destroyed. We thought he was lost forever. About six 
  months 
  >   later 
  >   >   we learned that a Science ship from Earth had been near by. 
  They 
  >   were 
  >   >   testing a new alloy, by seeing if their ship could withstand 
  a 
  >   sun 
  >   >   going nova near by. It did. They also pulled Optimus out 
  before 
  >   his 
  >   >   ship was destroyed. They had also taken aboard spores from 
  the 
  >   sun. 
  >   >   Mere contact with these spores turned living things into 
  hateful 
  >   >   maniacs. The scientists who found the spores hated 
  Transformers 
  >   so 
  >   >   they lead us to find Optimus. Then they infected many 
  Autobots. 
  >   It 
  >   >   soon spread to the Decepticons, the human race, and then into 
  the 
  >   >   universe. Rodimus was even infected. We managed to have a 
  >   Quintesson 
  >   >   rebuild Optimus once again. By coating himself in the alloy 
  from 
  >   the 
  >   >   science ship he was able to take the Matrix of Leadership 
  from 
  >   >   Rodimus. Optimus used the last power of the Matrix and 
  destroyed 
  >   the 
  >   >   Plague with the wisdom of the ages. Optimus continued to lead 
  us 
  >   from 
  >   >   then on untill the Great Wrs ended. Thats when everything was 
  >   scaled 
  >   >   down and Maximals and Predacons were born.
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > OOC: The events I am talking about can be seen in the 
  following 
  >   >   third season episodes of "The Transformers": "Dark 
  >   >   Awakaning," "Return of Optimus Prime Part. 1," and "Return of 
  >   Optimus 
  >   >   Prime Part. 2"
  >   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   >   >   From: airly2000 
  >   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   >   >   Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:13 AM
  >   >   >   Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   >   Nightlight:
  >   >   > 
  >   >   >   "But Didn't Optimus be..."she didnt't dare to 
  >   say "dead", 'cause 
  >   >   that 
  >   >   >   could affect Rodimus. She asked "What was the Hate Plage?"
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  >   >   >   > : : Kup : :
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > Kup: Yes, Rodimus lead from 2005 through 2006. Then 
  Optimus 
  >   >   came 
  >   >   >   back to us during the Hate Plague crises.
  >   >   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   >   >   >   From: airly2000 
  >   >   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   >   >   >   Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:01 AM
  >   >   >   >   Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   OOC: Nightlight's memory circuits had damaged, due 
  that 
  >   she 
  >   >   >   didn't 
  >   >   >   >   know so much about The Great War
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   Nightlight::
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   "So that happen in the great war???" said Nightlight, 
  she 
  >   >   knew 
  >   >   >   that 
  >   >   >   >   more pieces mor of her ancestors
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  >   >   >   >   > : : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   > Kup decided to inform Nighlight on everything with 
  >   >   Galvatron.
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   > Kup: Well, lass, it all goes back to the Great 
  Wars. 
  >   You 
  >   >   see 
  >   >   >   after 
  >   >   >   >   killing Optimus Prime in combat in 2005, Megatron was 
  >   rebuilt 
  >   >   >   into 
  >   >   >   >   Galvatron by Unicron. Galvatron continued to lead the 
  >   >   Decepticons 
  >   >   >   >   from then on. Rodimus here lead the Autobots after he 
  >   >   destroyed 
  >   >   >   >   Unicron and saved Cybertron. Being that they were the 
  >   >   opposing 
  >   >   >   >   Commanders that kinda made them into arch rivals. 
  This 
  >   still 
  >   >   >   exists 
  >   >   >   >   to this day.
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   > Rodimus Prime: The past continues to haunt me.....
  >   >   >   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   >   >   >   >   From: airly2000 
  >   >   >   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   >   >   >   >   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:47 PM
  >   >   >   >   >   Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   >   Nighlight::
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   >   "Who's... he?"asked Nightlight who wasn't sure if 
  >   would 
  >   >   be 
  >   >   >   good 
  >   >   >   >   time 
  >   >   >   >   >   to ask. She never had seen Rodimus so upset.
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> 
  wrote:
  >   >   >   >   >   > : : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :
  >   >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   >   > Rodimus recieved a comm message. When he 
  activated 
  >   it a 
  >   >   >   >   holographic 
  >   >   >   >   >   image of Galvatron appeared. It was perjected by 
  the 
  >   comm 
  >   >   >   system 
  >   >   >   >   in 
  >   >   >   >   >   his wrist. After it ended Rodimus looked inraged.
  >   >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   >   > Rodimus Prime: Ahhhhhhhh! I'll get 
  youuuuuuuuuuuu!
  >   >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   >   > Rodimus slams his fist intoa large boulder near 
  by. 
  >   The 
  >   >   >   boulder 
  >   >   >   >   >   crumbles around the Autobot's fist.
  >   >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   >   > Rodimus Prime: He thinks this is fun, Kup. When 
  it 
  >   >   comes 
  >   >   >   down 
  >   >   >   >   to 
  >   >   >   >   >   just him and I, I'll take him down for good. I 
  didn't 
  >   get 
  >   >   it 
  >   >   >   done 
  >   >   >   >   >   before, but I'll make sure of it now...
  >   >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   >   > Kup: Calm down, lad. I know how you feel. i've 
  been 
  >   >   with 
  >   >   >   you a 
  >   >   >   >   long 
  >   >   >   >   >   time Rody, I've seen all the crap he's done. 
  You'll 
  >   get 
  >   >   him, 
  >   >   >   and 
  >   >   >   >   I'll 
  >   >   >   >   >   be the first to congradulate you.
  >   >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   >   > Rodimus Prime: Thanks old friend.
  >   >   >   >   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   >   >   >   >   >   From: aerosmith60@c... 
  >   >   >   >   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   >   >   >   >   >   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 7:40 PM

  >   >   >   >   >   >   Galvatron saw  Quilldart jet towards the 
  >   base. "Good 
  >   >   no 
  >   >   >   doubt 
  >   >   >   >   the 
  >   >   >   >   >   other two are not far behind." He sent a comm to 
  >   Rodimus. 
  >   >   A 
  >   >   >   >   >   holographic image of himself would display. "I am 
  so 
  >   glad 
  >   >   >   Rodimus 
  >   >   >   >   we 
  >   >   >   >   >   could come to terms. As for our one on one 
  battle. 
  >   Dont 
  >   >   you 
  >   >   >   >   worry. 
  >   >   >   >   >   That will happen in due time. Until then best of 
  luck 
  >   my 
  >   >   old 
  >   >   >   >   friend. 
  >   >   >   >   >   I havent had this much fun since our little 
  unicron 
  >   >   >   >   >   adventure...wouldnt you agree?" He ended the comm 
  and 
  >   >   turned 
  >   >   >   back 
  >   >   >   >   to 
  >   >   >   >   >   the map. He had his three blips on the screen.

<DIV align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Arial size=2>: : Rodimus Prime / Kup : 
:</FONT></STRONG></DIV>
<DIV align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT></STRONG> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>Rodimus smiled.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Well 
when we are finished here i suggest you use the base's history banks. It might 
do you good to read up on our race.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>Rodimus's attention returns to the 
artifact.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Rodimus Prime:</STRONG> Kup, 
you think it's safe to take back with us?</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Kup: </STRONG>I'm not getting 
any reading that would say it's harmfull, so I think we can take it. I'll 
transport it in my bed.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>Kup transformes to his truck 
mode.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>Rodimus lifts the artifact from the 
ground and puts it in Kup's bed. He then transformes himself.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: 
</STRONG>Alright lets head home.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV align=center> </DIV>
<DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>They both pull out, heading for 
Maximal base.</FONT> </DIV>
